dc_title_s: Rough sketch map of the Paámiārs and Wakhaán : to accompany a report by Lieut. Colonel T. E. Gordon.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,650,000 (E 69°30'00"--E 78°30'00"/N 41°00'00"--N 35°00'00"). Covers eastern Tajikistan and small parts of Kyrgyzstan, Afghanistan, and Pakistan."From an original prepared & drawn by Lt. Col. Gordon, O. S. I., & Capt. Biddulph.""Lithd. in the Qr. Mr. General's Office.""Simla, September 1874."|40 x 52 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,650,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dc_publisher_s: Quarter Master General's Office ; Shimla, India
